newsitem.title: USA: Graphix names Hirschhorn CEO, Shishino CFO.
newsitem.headline: Graphix names Hirschhorn CEO, Shishino CFO.

text.p: Graphix Zone Tuesday said it named David Hirschhorn as co-chairman and chief executive officer and Robert Shishino as vice president and chief financial officer.
Prior to joining Graphix Zone, Hirschhorn was a managing director in the Corporate Finance Group of Cruttenden Roth, specializing in entertainment and new media transactions.
Shishino was formerly director of business administration for Nextel Communications Inc.

"David Hirschhorn has been instrumental for the past two years in all of Graphix Zone's acquisition and merger activities and strategic planning," said Ron Posner, co-chairman of Graphix Zone. "David's deal-making background in the entertainment industry and overall management skills will be critical for Graphix Zone's success as the company moves forward."
Graphix Zone publishes interactive multimedia products on CD-ROM, hybrid and Internet platforms and will publish on future platforms such as DVD.
A company spokeswoman later said Hirschhorn replaces as CEO Posner, who is now co-chairman. Shishino had been on board as a consultant as CFO and is now in the position full-time.
